pullRequest.body:
The lemmas which shall be added in subsequent PRs in the folder `Mathlib.Algebra.Homology.Factorizations` will be important in the definition of total derived functors on the bounded below derived categories.

```suggestion
fibrations for a model category structure on the bounded below
category of cochain complexes in `C`. In this folder, we intend to prove two factorization
lemmas in the category of bounded below cochain complexes (TODO):
```

```suggestion
order to define morphisms of cochain complexes which satisfy this property
```

```suggestion
the short complex `I âŸ¶ X âŸ¶ Y` has a splitting. -/

```
I find it easier to read that way.

    Â· exact

          s := Ïƒâ‚‚.s â‰« Ïƒâ‚.s
          f_r := by
            ext
            Â· simp [Ïƒâ‚.f_r]

            Â· simp [reassoc_of% Ïƒâ‚.s_g, Ïƒâ‚‚.f_r]
          s_g := by simp [reassoc_of% Ïƒâ‚.s_g, Ïƒâ‚‚.s_g]
          id := by

            have h := gâ‚ â‰«= Ïƒâ‚‚.id =â‰« Ïƒâ‚.s

Slightly golfed, if you find it less clear now, feel free to ignore it.
